ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Quad-Band Unlocked GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 GSM and 900/2100 3G frequencies plus GPRS/EDGE capabilities
2.8-inch touch screen, with four times the resolution of most phones; Powered by Windows Mobile® 6.1 Professional; Next generation TouchFLO user interface
3.2 megapixel camera for quality stills and video; Internal GPS antenna; microSD slot for expandable storage; Wi-Fi®: IEEE 802.11 b/g; Bluetooth® 2.0 Stereo
Up to 6 hours of talk time, up to 365 hours of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: HTC T3232 Touch 3G Unlocked Phone with 3.2 MP Camera, WiFi and gps navigation--International Version with Warranty (Brown)
